sources.title: The Young Lions (1958)
sources.description: The lives of three young men, a German and two Americans, during WWII. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/the-young-lions-1958/

sources.title: The Young Lions (1958) Marlon Brando · Montgomery Clift
sources.description: Four soldiers-two Germans ( Maximilian Schell , Marlon Brando ) and two Americans ( Montgomery Clift , Dean Martin )-experience the horrors of World War II. Brando made his character more sympathetic than Irwin Shaw 's original book intended. Because of these and other changes, the author distanced himself from the film adaptation. Nevertheless, it remains a multifaceted portrayal of the war years.

metadata.Plot: The destiny of three soldiers during World War II. The German officer Christian Diestl approves less and less of the war. Jewish-American Noah Ackerman deals with antisemitism at home and in the army while entertainer Michael Whiteacre transforms from playboy to hero.
metadata.Actors: Marlon Brando, Montgomery Clift, Dean Martin
metadata.Awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. 1 win & 7 nominations total
